name: Automatonics
description:
The game is inspired by classic platformers and shooting games. You play as a little round robot that goes around different levels killing enemy robots and collecting different power-ups along the way. The game can be played from a Controller (recommended) or Keyboard.

This game is currently under development, this is a playable demo. Please feel free to play and provide feedback if you would like. 

Future releases will include levels, worlds, power-ups and upgrades.
